landing.title: Thai Massage | Your Business Name - Traditional Healing
landing.description: Experience authentic Thai massage therapy. Ancient healing techniques for modern wellness, stress relief, and deep relaxation.

content.paragraph1: Thai massage is an ancient healing practice that combines acupressure, assisted yoga postures, and Ayurvedic principles. Unlike traditional Western massage, Thai massage is performed fully clothed on a comfortable mat on the floor.
content.paragraph2: This therapeutic technique works along energy lines in the body, known as 'sen' lines, to release blockages and restore balance. Through rhythmic compression, gentle rocking, and passive stretching, Thai massage helps improve flexibility, reduce tension, and promote overall wellbeing.
content.paragraph3: Each session is tailored to your individual needs and comfort level. Our experienced therapists use their hands, thumbs, elbows, forearms, and sometimes feet to apply pressure and guide you through gentle stretches.
content.paragraph4: Whether you're seeking relief from chronic pain, improved flexibility, or simply deep relaxation, Thai massage offers a holistic approach to healing that benefits both body and mind.
content.orderedList1: Improves flexibility and range of motion through assisted stretching
content.orderedList2: Relieves muscle tension and reduces chronic pain
content.orderedList3: Enhances circulation and boosts energy levels
content.h4: What to Expect During Your Session
content.unorderedList3: Communicate with your therapist about pressure and comfort
